caption: Relating to the determination of resident status of students by public institutions of higher education.
summary: This bill amends Texas Education Code to restrict resident status determination for higher education. It removes provisions allowing high school graduates with 3-year state residency to qualify as residents. Most significantly, it explicitly prohibits unauthorized immigrants from being considered state residents. This affects Chinese students and other international students without proper authorization to be in the US, requiring them to pay higher non-resident tuition rates.
translation: 该法案修改德克萨斯州教育法，限制高等教育居民身份的认定。法案删除了允许在州内居住3年的高中毕业生获得居民身份的条款。最重要的是，法案明确禁止未获得合法居留权的移民被视为州居民。这将影响在美国没有proper授权的中国学生和其他国际学生，要求他们支付更高的非居民学费。
